GameEventAction.Description:
Our newly formed Republic will stand the test of time!
We have recently made great strides in:
[ULI][RESEARCH]Planetary Administration[/RESEARCH][/ULI] [ULI][RESEARCH]Diplomatic Focus[/RESEARCH][/ULI]
Our homeworld will become a beacon for peace and prosperity with our newly finished [RESOURCE]Prime Capitol[/RESOURCE] building, where we shall hold our grand assemblies, work out our differences, and forge a lasting peace.

Our thriving democracy stands on the precipice of a new era of space exploration and tourism, with:
[ULI][RESEARCH]Starship Recreation Systems[/RESEARCH][/ULI] [ULI][RESEARCH]Interstellar Commerce[/RESEARCH][/ULI] [ULI][RESEARCH]Stellar Transport Systems[/RESEARCH][/ULI] [ULI][RESEARCH]Civilian Transports[/RESEARCH][/ULI]
With our newly finished [RESOURCE]Grand Pnyx[/RESOURCE], it is time for our people to unite and reach for the stars!

The warriors of your great empire spread before you in their millions!
Your elite troops stand ready, eagerly awaiting an opportunity for glory, valor, and a good death!
Heads of all of the noblest of tribes have gathered at thew newly completed [RESOURCE]Clan Parliament[/RESOURCE] to hear your plans for a bountiful future!

Our Captains of Industry await your order to open a new era of prosperity and wealth, having recently compelted:
[ULI][RESEARCH]Interstellar Commerce[/RESEARCH][/ULI] [ULI][RESEARCH]Enhanced Commerce Center[/RESEARCH][/ULI]
Now that we have completed the [RESOURCE]Unified Exchange[/RESOURCE], our homeworld thrums with the sound of commerce, and our people await your bold business plans.

Supreme Commander! We have recently completed:
[ULI][RESEARCH]War Planning Complex[/RESEARCH][/ULI] [ULI][RESEARCH]Stellar Frigates[/RESEARCH][/ULI] [ULI][RESEARCH]Zero-G Combat[/RESEARCH][/ULI] [ULI][RESEARCH]Assault Pods[/RESEARCH][/ULI] [ULI][RESEARCH]Improved Crew Accommodations[/RESEARCH][/ULI] [ULI][RESEARCH]Improved Ground Combat[/RESEARCH][/ULI] [ULI][RESEARCH]Armored[/RESEARCH][/ULI]
Your top admirals and generals are gathered within of your newly completed [RESOURCE]War Planning Complex[/RESOURCE], on this most auspicious day, the day you take command over our forces. No longer does another stand above you in the chain of command.
Additionally, two units of state of the art armored have just been completed and yours to conquer the stars with!

Sire, I am proud to announce the recent completion of:
[ULI][RESEARCH]Improved Command[/RESEARCH][/ULI] [ULI][RESEARCH]Improved Crew Accommodations[/RESEARCH][/ULI]
Your elite royal guard stands at sharp attention along the halls of your newly completed [RESOURCE]Royal Palace[/RESOURCE], on this most auspicious day, the day of your coronation.
Millions of your subjects look on from the courtyard below, and billions more are tuned in to state media in every corner of your empire to get a glimpse of their new sovereign, and wonder, what comes next?

Your initial directive as head researcher and first amongst equals has paid off with the completion of:
[ULI][RESEARCH]Exploration Scanners[/RESEARCH][/ULI] [ULI][RESEARCH]Planetary Exploration[/RESEARCH][/ULI] [ULI][RESEARCH]Long Range Sensors[/RESEARCH][/ULI]
We have also completed the construction of the vaunted [RESOURCE]Technosphere Citadel[/RESOURCE], where we will undoubtedly make many more illustrious discoveries!
Another [CHARACTER]scientist[/CHARACTER] nearly your equal has emerged to head up our day to day operations now that you have accepted your appointment as head of the government. Worry not that we will execute your directions with all professional alacrity as befits your example and legacy as chief scientist of this illustrious instituion. I eagerly await your further instructions to unlock the secrets of the stars to spread our kind over the whole of the cosmos!

The hive is ready to serve! We have completed some important breakthroughs in:
[ULI][RESEARCH]Assault Pods[/RESEARCH][/ULI] [ULI][RESEARCH]Zero-G Combat[/RESEARCH][/ULI] [ULI][RESEARCH]Improved Crew Compartments[/RESEARCH][/ULI] [ULI][RESEARCH]Stellar Transport Systems[/RESEARCH][/ULI] [ULI][RESEARCH]Military Transports[/RESEARCH][/ULI]
Our first army awaits your command at our homeworld where you oversee all from your [RESOURCE]Seat of Consciousness[/RESOURCE].

Our newly formed Shadow Republic will rule all under an iron thumb!
We have nearly completed:
[ULI][RESEARCH]Planetary Administration[/RESEARCH][/ULI] [ULI][RESEARCH]Diplomatic Focus[/RESEARCH][/ULI] [ULI][RESEARCH]Espionage Focus[/RESEARCH][/ULI]
Our capital will the center of our new power, and our [RESOURCE]Shadow Parliament[/RESOURCE] will facilitate the real machinations of power!

Librarian, we have just completed our initial research efforts to kickstart our efforts:
[ULI][RESEARCH]Standard Sensors[/RESEARCH][/ULI] [ULI][RESEARCH]Long Range Sensors[/RESEARCH][/ULI] [ULI][RESEARCH]Exploration Scanners[/RESEARCH][/ULI] [ULI][RESEARCH]Planetary Exploration[/RESEARCH][/ULI]
Knowledge is Power. We have amassed the sum total of our current knowledge in our newly completed [RESOURCE]Boundless Archives[/RESOURCE] at our capitol.
A whole galaxy awaits us to be meticulously analyzed, cataloged, and archived for the eons!
